column1: AD:This MR image of the brain is diagnostic of Alzheimer's disease. Medial temporal lobe atrophy, particularly in the hippocampus and entorhinal cortex, is visible. Enlarged lateral ventricles suggest cerebral atrophy. Thinning observed in parietal and temporal cortices.

CN:This MR image of the brain is diagnostic of normal. Medial temporal structures are full, with no atrophy. Ventricles are compact, without dilation. Parietal and temporal cortical regions appear thick and regular, age-appropriate.
